explains: v. 下毛毛雨，下蒙蒙细雨； （毛毛雨似的）洒落；（毛毛雨似的）洒落
n. 毛毛细雨，蒙蒙细雨；（烹）（浇在食品上的）液态调料细流

sentences.en: A fine drizzle began to veil the hills.
sentences.cn: 蒙蒙细雨渐渐笼罩了群山。

sentences.en: Clouds had come down and it was starting to drizzle.
sentences.cn: 云压了下来，开始下起了毛毛雨。

sentences.en: The drizzle had now stopped and the sun was breaking through.
sentences.cn: 细雨已经停了，太阳露出了脸。
